snippet.title: BigFool Official Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3038590/BigFool/

A small little game where your friends and you have a once in a lifetime opportunity: Hunt BigFool. BigFool is an elusive, fearsome creature of the night from unknown origins. Explore the Crimblr Forest and various points of interest, keep an eye and an ear out, and take down this iconic beast.
